      • getFileInfo

        @NotNull
FileInfo getFileInfo(java.lang.String path)
                     throws STRuntimeException
        Retrieve file details. Please note this will throw an exception if the file doesn't exist. If you are not sure of the file presence, please use fileExists(String) first.
        Parameters:
        path - DataFile path
        Returns:
        FileInfo object.
        Throws:
        STRuntimeException - If an error occured while retrieving file details, or if the file doesn't exist.

      • getFileSha1

        byte[] getFileSha1(java.lang.String path)
                   throws STRuntimeException
        get a SHA1 checkum of a file.
        Parameters:
        path - file to calculate checksum from.
        Returns:
        SHA1 digest
        Throws:
        STRuntimeException - If an error occurs calculating SHA1 checksum.
